title: Spacious 2 Bed 2 Bath
posting_body: ['Toscana Apartments', '8490 N. Sheridan Blvd.', 'Arvada, CO 80003', 'Interested in more information?', 'Visit link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Location + Affordable = Toscana', 'Welcome to Toscana, a remarkable community of apartment homes centrally located in Arvada, CO.', 'Toscana features stunning studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments.', 'Our pet-friendly apartments are nestled in a lovely community with a sparkling pool and gorgeous landscaping.', 'Every inch of our studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments in Westminster, CO is crafted with your lifestyle in mind.', 'Lose yourself in an Italian dream when you lease one of our unique Toscana apartments.', 'Call us or stop by our leasing office today to schedule your tour of our studio, one- and two-bedroom floor plans.', 'Features', '- Studio, 1 & 2-Bedroom Affordable Homes', '- Open Size Kitchens', '- Central Heat & Air Conditioning', '-Quaint Fireplaces for Those Chilly Nights', '-Distinct floor plans to choose from', '- Select apartments showcase mirrored, walk-in closets and grand vaulted ceilings.', 'Community Amenities', '- Close to Shopping, Restaurants, & Highway', '-- Clothes Care Center with On-Site Laundry Facility', '- On-Site Professional Management & Maintenance', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '-Courtesy Patrol', '- Resident Package Parcel Receiving', '-Sparkling swimming Pool', '-Business Center', '-Dog Park', '-Playground', '- Steps from Bus Line & Light Rail Line', '$500 Security Deposit with Approved Credit', 'Application Fee $19 per adult', 'Driving Directions', 'Toscana is open for tours and appointments.', 'The leasing office is located at 8490 N. Sheridan blvd.', 'Arvada, CO 80003.', 'We are on the west-facing side of the street off Sheridan Boulevard.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Saturday: 10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Income Requirements:', 'Toscana is a tax-credit property and apartments are income-restricted.', 'To qualify, each household must earn a minimum of 2.5 times the rent.', 'Please call for details.', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
